Step 1: Connect your streaming accounts: Step 1: Connect your streaming accounts in the <stream>Stream</stream> settings.
Step 2: Ensure the \"Confirm stream titl: Step 2: Ensure the "Confirm stream title and game before going live" option is checked in the <general>General</general> settings tab.

Stream to multiple platforms at once wit: Stream to multiple platforms at once with <ultra>Streamlabs Ultra</ultra>.
Stream to horizontal and vertical platfo: Stream to horizontal and vertical platforms simultaneously. Recordings will be in horizontal only.

<dualoutput>Dual Output</dualoutput> is: <dualoutput>Dual Output</dualoutput> is enabled - you must stream to one horizontal and one vertical platform.

To use Dual Output you must stream to at: To use Dual Output you must stream to at least one horizontal and one vertical platform.
Cannot toggle Dual Output while live.
Cannot toggle Dual Output while in Studi: Cannot toggle Dual Output while in Studio Mode.
Dual Output can’t be displayed - Selecti: Dual Output can’t be displayed - Selective Recording only works with horizontal sources and disables editing the vertical output scene. Please disable selective recording from Sources to set up Dual Output.
Selective Recording can only be used wit: Selective Recording can only be used with horizontal sources.
Set up Go Live Settings for Dual Output: Set up Go Live Settings for Dual Output Mode in the Go Live window.
Cannot toggle Studio Mode in Dual Output: Cannot toggle Studio Mode in Dual Output Mode.
Upgrade your stream with premium overlay: Upgrade your stream with premium overlays with <ultra>Streamlabs Ultra</ultra>.

You have selected %{colorFormat} as Colo: You have selected %{colorFormat} as Color Format. Formats other than NV12 and P010 are commonly used for recording, and might incur high CPU usage or the streaming platform might not support it. Go to Settings -> Advanced -> Video to review.
